title: Oh dear another VS Event
body:
Uh let's see Darius is a fan of Endless war.
Why does that sound familiar.
https://pa1.narvii.com/6558/ac75e69408bcf07741df821279b3343d9e8a81ea_hq.gif
Oh....Right....Well I'm NOT siding with that I know how that turns out and it sucks, Whats Garen up too.
(Listens to Garens Quotes) Huh....Garen sounds kind of like a dick but.......endless war sucks it just sucks. Normal War sucks, endless war is worse.
Hmmm Guess i'm on team Garen, better get the batman memes ready
https://memegenerator.net/img/instances/56751762/-justice-intensifies-.jpg

replies.body: Team Darius because God Loser Garen is an annoying jerk.

If I was creative I would make a meme respond, but I'm not so here we are.
Atleast I'm not the only Justice lover here
Team Darius because he gives more chance for skins and the war might be "endless" but the event last for what? a month?

I'm not on either side. I'm treating this like the 2016 US presidential election.

Spoiler Alert: I didn't vote.

ALSO: Don't turn this into a political debate and don't take this post seriously. Riot doesn't like seeing political discussions on their Christian forums.

From my understanding, you *have* to participate. From what I have read on it, you get a popup selection when you log in during the event. Doesn't sound like there will be an "abstain" option.

I haven't looked at the PBE at all, I never do, so if there is one on PBE there will probably be one on live servers so idk. I'm just gonna pick one for free shit, both sides can go fuck themselves for all I care.
i was so happy when they opened up the pbe with the honor system.  And then i went on it twice
All i know is.... Another patch, another $100 in RP. Damnit rito.
